Is Cache expensive?

The value of the average home in Cache is $133,100.

Compared to its nearby areas, Cache is significantly more expensive, and it is substantially less expensive compared to the country as a whole. However, it's a little less expensive compared to Oklahoma City.

Nearby places

Altus

The city of Altus is 34 miles west of Cache. Its real estate prices are a bit less expensive. The average home value there is $107,200, which is $25,900 (19%) lower than Cache.

Anadarko

The city of Anadarko is 36 miles northeast of Cache. Housing prices there are significantly less expensive. Its average home price is $72,500, which comes out to $60,600 (45%) lower than Cache.

Amber

Amber is 53 miles northeast of Cache. Its housing prices are substantially less expensive. The average home price there is $68,800, which is $64,300 (48%) lower than Cache.

Addington

Addington is 43 miles southeast of Cache. Its housing prices are a lot less expensive. Its average home cost is $66,700, which works out to $66,400 (49%) lower than Cache.

Alex

Alex is 47 miles northeast of Cache. Real estate prices there are a lot less expensive. The average home cost there is $47,500, which comes out to $85,600 (64%) lower than Cache.
